name: e2e
description: End to end tests for the cardano-js-sdk packages.

scripts.private-network:up: CARDANO_DB_SYNC_VERSION=13.0.0-rc3 DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 OGMIOS_PORT=1338 NETWORK=testnet docker-compose -p private-testnet-e2e up
scripts.private-network:down: CARDANO_DB_SYNC_VERSION=13.0.0-rc3 DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 OGMIOS_PORT=1338 NETWORK=testnet docker-compose -p private-testnet-e2e down -v --remove-orphans

author: Angel Castillo
